item.title: mydlink Website from Linux
item.description:
Hi had the chance to buy a Dlink camera, waterproof, with magnetic base and rated for exteriors for a really great price a while ago D-Link DCS 8600LH ðŸ›’#ad and later a camera with pan and tilt from Dlink too D-Link DCS-6500LH ðŸ›’#ad

The camera, of course has an application for configuration, viewing the image, etc named ‘mydlink’ which has a web counterpart at https://mydlink.com/, but unfortunately, when you try to access the website, there’s little you can do:
